Chronic pain is pain (an unpleasant sense of discomfort) that persists or progresses over a long period of time. Chronic pain typically has persisted for at least 3 months. Chronic pain tends to interfere with the ability to perform activities of daily living and affects the quality of life.

Acupuncture is the most studied aspect of traditional Chinese medicine. Although numerous scientific theories attempt to explain how and why acupuncture works, there exists no definitive explanation.
